channel.title: Poland on Baltic Security Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Poland on Baltic Security Foundation

item.title: Regional Activities
item.description: October 2019 has been busy for the Baltic Security Foundation, pursuing our goal of fostering and promoting Baltic defense and security.

item.title: Baltic Security Foundation Presents at the ECPR General Conference in Wrocław
item.description: BSF President Mr. Olevs Nikers and BSF Director Mr. Otto Tabuns took part in the panel “Addressing Security Challenges in the Baltic Region through Multilateral Cooperation” of the European Consortium for Political Research (ECPR) 13th General Conference September 5, 2019 in Wrocław, Poland.
